A 256-bit hash that can be used to ident: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
A new version of Coin Wallet is availabl: A new version of Coin Wallet is available. Would you like to update it now?
Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
Account NET usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
Address will be changed after receiving: Address will be changed after receiving funds. All previously used addresses remain valid and still can be used to receive funds multiple times. Please use a fresh address for each receiving transaction to enhance your privacy.
All tokens on the {name} platform will a: All tokens on the {name} platform will also be removed.
Almost done! Enter the following words f: Almost done! Enter the following words from your passphrase.
An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer tha: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
Are you sure you want to remove your acc: Are you sure you want to remove your account? You cannot undo this action.
Are you sure you want to remove {name} f: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the wallet?
Balance of private key is too small for: Balance of private key is too small for transfer. Minimum is {amount} {symbol}
Before you start using Mecto, you need t: Before you start using Mecto, you need to enter a name that will help others identify you.
Crypto information will be displayed her: Crypto information will be displayed here.
Deposit has been received. Awaiting swap: Deposit has been received. Awaiting swap.
Derivation path defines how to derive pr: Derivation path defines how to derive private keys from passphrase.
Destination address should not be equal: Destination address should not be equal source address
Do you want to add {crypto} to your wall: Do you want to add {crypto} to your wallet?
Error! Please ensure that your Tor VPN i: Error! Please ensure that your Tor VPN is active.
Gas limit is the amount of gas to send w: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster.
Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is: Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is a service that lets you re-use the same avatar across websites and apps by specifying an email address.
Hardware keys are not supported by your: Hardware keys are not supported by your device.
I agree to the Terms of Service: I agree to the Terms of Service
I have written down or otherwise securel: I have written down or otherwise securely stored my passphrase
Insufficient funds to pay the transactio: Insufficient funds to pay the transaction fee. Required {amount} {symbol}
It is very important to write down the p: It is very important to write down the passphrase.
No funds. Buy or receive {symbol} to con: No funds. Buy or receive {symbol} to continue.
Not all address types are fully compatib: Not all address types are fully compatible on all platforms, so it is important to use a compatible address.
Not enough funds on your balance, maximu: Not enough funds on your balance, maximum {amount} {symbol}
Not your transaction. It can't be accept: Not your transaction. It can't be accepted.
Only transactions addressed to you can b: Only transactions addressed to you can be accepted. The minimum number of confirmations is 10.
Please accept transaction to receive fun: Please accept transaction to receive funds.
Please confirm synchronization with this: Please confirm synchronization with this device.
Please enable camera access in Settings: Please enable camera access in Settings to continue.
Please enable geolocation access in Sett: Please enable geolocation access in Settings to continue.
Please select a crypto to swap: Please select a crypto to swap
Please try again with a new connection U: Please try again with a new connection URI
Recipient's wallet requires a destinatio: Recipient's wallet requires a destination tag.
Route traffic through Tor network. Ensur: Route traffic through Tor network. Ensure that your Tor VPN is active.
Select a crypto from your wallet.
Select new cryptos you want to add to yo: Select new cryptos you want to add to your wallet.
Send coins, export private keys, remove: Send coins, export private keys, remove account, security settings.
Sign this message only if you completely: Sign this message only if you completely understand it.
Some funds are temporarily unavailable. To send this transaction, you will need to wait for your pending transactions to be confirmed first. Available {amount} {symbol}
Start with a few cryptos, others will be: Start with a few cryptos, others will be available after login.
Swap failed and funds were refunded to y: Swap failed and funds were refunded to your wallet.
The EOS account name must be exactly 12: The EOS account name must be exactly 12 characters long and consist of lowercase letters and digits from 1 to 5.
The extra amount will be deposited to th: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
The higher the speed, the faster transac: The higher the speed, the faster transaction is processed by the network.
The memo contains optional extra informa: The memo contains optional extra information.
The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
There are currently no providers availab: There are currently no providers available
There are currently no providers available.
This account name is already taken, plea: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
This allows you to open your wallet on m: This allows you to open your wallet on multiple devices and keeps it secure.
This domain is flagged as malicious and: This domain is flagged as malicious and potentially harmful.
This will transfer all coins from the pr: This will transfer all coins from the private key address to your wallet.
This will transfer all tokens from the p: This will transfer all tokens from the private key address to your wallet.
To create a new account you need to make: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than {price} EOS) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
Transaction has been expired. Please try: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
Transaction not found or has less than 1: Transaction not found or has less than 10 confirmations. Please wait 20 minutes and try again.
Use Face ID instead of PIN.
Use Touch ID instead of PIN.
Value is too big, maximum {amount} {symb: Value is too big, maximum {amount} {symbol} (incl. fee)
Value is too small for this destination: Value is too small for this destination address, minimum {amount} {symbol}
We are about to generate your very own p: We are about to generate your very own passphrase
You do not have any transactions yet.
Your passphrase will not be shown again. You will lose access to your wallet without the passphrase.
Your private keys are keys to your funds: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
Your transaction will appear in your his: Your transaction will appear in your history tab shortly.
Your wallet has no private keys with coi: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
{crypto} is based on {platform}, which i: {crypto} is based on {platform}, which isn't in your wallet yet, so it will also be added.
{name} node error. Please try again late: {name} node error. Please try again later.
